TopicTitle: Can't get crew manifest mod to work.

Articles.Content:
I have a feeling that it's the folders, the mod is in gamedata, I tried putting it in the parts folder but it didn't work there. and I put the dll in the plugin folder like it said.

Just simply copy the dll to the Plugins folder and the part to the parts folder. You can add the module to any existing part by adding the following module to any parts config file. MODULE { name = CrewManifestModule } The included package includes modified configs for all the stock pods.
Edited June 25, 2013 by WhiteWeasel
The new update doesn't need a part anymore. Download 5.4.0 from the forum thread and just drop everything in GameData and it should work, I've been using it since the version was released
No problem! There should be a small icon in the top left of your screen, you can even move it around from the Space Center scene
Mod questions are best asked in the mod thread... FYI.
